snippet.title: Little Deviants PS Vita Trailer
snippet.description: Join the Little Deviants in a series of madcap adventures that allow you to have fun discovering and experimenting with the new PS Vita functions - including rear touch, front touch, six-axis motion senors, front and rear cameras and microphone.
